issue.message: The OpenAPI specification is missing a server definition for a custom Docker domain, which is required for flexible deployment.

repairs.action_taken: Added a new server definition to the OpenAPI specification. The new server URL is 'https://{my-docker-domain}/v1.33', and it includes a 'my-docker-domain' variable with a default value of 'docker.example.com' and a description 'The custom domain for your Docker API instance.'.
